website_summaries.verdict: A simple way to get yourself a cup of drip coffee at the campsite.
pros: System nests together and is easy to pack
Practical way to get drip coffee
cons: A pour over method, which means you will need a separate pot or device to heat your water

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery and wonderful design
customer_reviews.text: I loved that I received this very promptly and the design is outstanding. What I didn't like, (and this may just be my fault for not reading details more carefully before I ordered) the interior of the thermos is a clear shiny plastic and I try to minimize the amounts of plastics I use, especially when using something acid or something hot that might tend to leach chemical compounds into the liquid I drink. I was impressed with how quickly this was delivered and how easy it was to return. If the plastic lining isn't something that bothers you, I would recommend it in every other way!
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Solid Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: The whole thing is a bit big/heavy for backpacking, and could take ups come valuable space, but it's perfect for camping! Although the whole thing is a bit big for backpacking it wouldn't be too difficult to just take the flexible top silicone piece and reusable filter and use it with any backpacking cup that you have. The bonus of this coffee maker is that it collapses to all fit in the base for camping.
customer_reviews.author: CKirk

customer_reviews.title: Good camping kit
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my camping kit and have used it on 4 trips. I like it with paper filters vs the reusable mesh it comes with. Makes good coffee, but as will all pour overs, make sure you warm it with hot water first and warm your cup as you lose lots of heat in the process.
customer_reviews.author: James H

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Packable and Good Coffee
customer_reviews.text: This makes good pour through coffee. I find it difficult to use with a paper filter cone, perhaps because I don't like to wait any longer than I have to for coffee and getting the water to boil is already trying my patience. However, by setting my GSI JavaMill to coarse grind I can use the included filter without much issue with grounds. I had grounds in my coffee from my percolator so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie D

customer_reviews.title: This a well made apparatus. My biggest hang-up is ...
customer_reviews.text: This a well made apparatus. My biggest hang-up is that mine failed to include the reusable mesh filter. Though this doesn't make the product unuseable, it ia disappointing because the packaging and Amazon description say that the filter is included. I'd give it 5 stars if it was received as described.
customer_reviews.author: saygoodbyei

customer_reviews.title: A must for camping or anytime
customer_reviews.text: Top notch product. I've used it a couple dozen times, now. It's quite convenient and durable! The sleeve holds the heat well enough and there is absolutely no 'plastic-y' taste to it. I prefer only pour over coffee and this fit the bill perfectly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: B. Turek

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee. Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great coffee maker not only for camping but home as well. What makes it even better is the customer service of this company. They dealt with questions and concerns so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kecko Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee in the camper!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker! We use this in our camper when there are no electrical hookups. The pour over method makes great coffee and this makes it easy to make more than one cup at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J DeVries

customer_reviews.title: Great Morning Java while camping.
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use, clean, transport. seems quit sturdy. must have a little patients when poring fresh water through the coffee grounds, but well worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T.

customer_reviews.title: Id buy it again. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a recent canoe camping trip for 5 people. It worked great! Plenty of coffee. I have zero complaints. I was worried about it being broken in the pack so i took extra precaution when packing it.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Hutchens

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend the GSI Javadrip
customer_reviews.text: I am a drip coffee nut! At home I have a Chemex. For camping I've tried french press, single cup drip and several others.This one fits the bill. I highly recommend the GSI Javadrip. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Son in army uses it in the field for making drip coffee
customer_reviews.author: Frank T.

customer_reviews.title: No big breakthrough, but stores nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Bigger and bulkier that I thought it would be. We'll continue to use our small drip hotel room style coffee maker, since we still have to heat the water anyway. We have a 1000 watt inverter that powers our coffee maker without a problem. I can see it being used for tent campers.
customer_reviews.author: St. Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this for camping. Great to make coffee for 2-3 people easy
customer_reviews.author: Datizsonice

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Want an easy way to make a couple of cups coffee while sitting around a campfire or out hiking? This is it. This is easy to use, cleans up easy and works. You can’t buy an easier way to make a good cup of coffee and be portable.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Better if it had a lid to use as a mug after brewing the coffee.  Not great for backpacking.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a coffee solution for backpacking. This is really too heavy, and once you take off the brewing cone, you have no lid. Really needs a lid and the ability to use as a mug after brewing. The key to saving weight when backpacking is selecting products that have multiple uses. The design of this assumes you have a seperate mug for your freshly brewed coffee. Might be fine for car camping, but then it probably wouldn't have the capacity needed for multiple campers, so I don't really see the point of this design.
customer_reviews.author: volvoguy

product_meta.title: GSI Outdoors 30 fl. oz. JavaDrip for Portable Drip Coffee System at The Office or Camping
product_meta.description: Size:30 fl. oz.The 30 fl. oz. JavaDrip brings the ease and familiarity of your home coffee maker wherever your adventures may take you. Be the hero of your camp when you whip up several instant cups of morning bliss with this portable coffee maker. Lightweight, BPA-Free, and shatter-resistant, it goes anywhere. Double-walled, insulated lid and ballistic nylon-wrapped cozy hold in temperature while brewing and serving. Silicone drip cone locks to lid while brewing and sits upright when removed to prevent spills. Drip cone collapses to nest within carafe for compact packing and storage. Includes easy-to-clean, reusable cloth filter. BPA-Free carafe is lightweight and shatter-resistant, allowing you to enjoy drip coffee anywhere.
feature_bullets: STAY CAFFEINATED: Coffee? Always! The Java Drip makes your caffeine needs attainable during car camping, gourmet backpacking, or any pursuit where space and weight is at a premium, but coffee is a must.
NO SPILLS, NO PROBLEM: The Java Drip’s unique silicone drip cone locks to the lid while when brewing and sits upright when removed for stable, spill-free brewing, even during your wildest adventures.
DESIGNED FOR DURABILITY: Measuring 4.5 by 4.2 by 7 inches, the Java Drip is BPA-Free and shatter resistant.
KEEP YOUR COFFEE WARM: The Java Drip has a double-walled, insulated lid and ballistic nylon-wrapped cozy hold in temperature while brewing and serving to keep that coffee piping hot.

LIFETIME PROMISE: GSI Outdoors spent over 30 years building quality, performance products and stands behind them 100%. GSI Outdoors warranties all products for the original owner against manufacturing defects for the lifetime of the product.
